name: Blueberry, Ginger, and Kefir Smoothie
description: A thick, frosty blueberry shake made with frozen kefir cubes and fresh ginger.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons plain whole-milk kefir
1/2 teaspoon freshly grated peeled ginger, lightly packed

recipeInstructions.text: For the Kefir Ice Cubes: Divide kefir between 5 slots of an ice cube tray, using about 2 tablespoons for each cube. Freeze overnight, remove from the tray, and store in a zipper-lock bag in the freezer.

For the Smoothie: Blend blueberries and kefir on low until a rough puree forms. Add ginger and kefir ice cubes and blend until completely smooth. Garnish with extra fresh blueberries, if desired, and serve immediately.
